job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We are a startup helping solve the problem of financial inclusion. <br>We are looking for an optimistic and mission driven full stack engineer that ships on time.<br><br>Skill set:<br><br>React <br>Mongo <br>Express <br>Solidity <br>Python is a given <br>Bonus points for GoLang <br>JavaScript is a given as well<br><br>We’re building a couple of different payment solutions and looking for people that can learn quickly!
